actions.text: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation Discharged by Unanimous Consent.
Called up by House by Unanimous Consent.

actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.

official_title: A bill to designate the main channel for the project for San Leandro Marina, California, as the "Jack D. Maltester Channel", and for other purposes.

summary.text: (Measure passed House, amended) Designates the main channel for the project for San Leandro Marina, California, as the Jack D. Maltester Channel. Designates the U.S. Post Office Building, Flushing, New York, as the Benjamin S. Rosenthal Post Office Building. Requires the Postmaster General to install an appropriate plaque indicating such designation. Designates the Mid-Atlantic Program Service Center, Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, as the William A. Barrett Social Security Building. Designates the U.S. Post Office Building, Moorestown, New Jersey, as the Edwin B. Forsythe Post Office Building. Designates the U.S. Post Office Building, Jeannette, Pennsylvania, as the John Dent Post Office Building. Designates the U.S. Post Office Building, Romulus, Michigan, as the Carl W. Morris Post Office Building.

titles.title: A bill to designate the main channel for the project for San Leandro Marina, California, as the "Jack D. Maltester Channel", and for other purposes.
